text: The Solomon Islands was first at the Olympic Games in 1984. They have been in every Summer Olympic Games since then.Solomon Islands at the Olympics , The Telegraph The nation has never been in the Winter Olympic Games. As of 2011, no athlete for the Solomon Islands has won an Olympic medal. The National Olympic Committee for the Solomon Islands was formed in 1983 and recognized by the International Olympic Committee that same year. ==Related pages== * List of IOC country codes == References == ==Other websites == * Solomon Islands profile at London2012.com * Category:Nations at the Olympics Category:National sports teams of the Solomon Islands
title: Solomon Islands at the Olympics
